common_errors.pattern: error parsing format description|invalid format component
causes: Missing closing bracket for optional segments
Mixing strftime tokens instead of time format DSL

common_errors.pattern: Parse error|could not parse .* using format
common_errors.meaning: String does not match provided format description
causes: Input missing offset when format expects it
Lower/upper case mismatch for month/day names
solutions: Align format with input precisely or use well_known formats
Normalize input casing or use case-insensitive parsing where possible
Clamp nanos and carry to seconds when needed

common_errors.meaning: Local timezone offset could not be determined
causes: Lacking TZ data on target system
Overflow when combining seconds and nanos
Input from untrusted source not validated
solutions: Divide ms by 1000 before passing to from_unix_timestamp
